awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 5 wins & 1 nomination.

fullplot: Documentary on the life of jazz trumpeter and drug addict Chet Baker. Fascinating series of interviews with friends, family, associates and lovers, interspersed with film from Baker's earlier life and some modern-day performances.

title: Let's Get Lost
